CustomField.formula: IF(NoT(ISBLANK(Account_Team_Member__c)), 'CAT' + '-' + Account_Team_Member__r.Id , IF(NoT(ISBLANK(Approver_Contact__c )), 'Contact' + '-' + Approver_Contact__r.Id ,IF(NoT( ISBLANK(Title__c )), 'Title' + '-' + Title__r.Id,IF(NoT( ISBLANK(Department__r.Name) ), 'Department' + '-'+ Department__r.Id ,IF(NoT( ISBLANK( User__c ) ),'User' + '-' +User__r.Id, IF(NoT( ISBLANK( Email__c ) ),'Email' + '-' + Email__c ,null))))))
CustomField.label: ServiceApprover
